description.lang: Aeotec LED Bulb is a low-cost Z-Wave LED module which allows control (on/off/dim) with the use of Z-Wave. Its a bulb has a Smart RGB LED, which can be used to add colour to your home. The bulb has 5 main colour channels available for you to adjust: Red, Green, Blue, Warm White and Cold White. You can configure its colour according to your favour.The LED Bulb is also a security Z-wave device and supports the Over The Air (OTA) feature for the products firmware upgrade.

Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate.When the Bulb is turned on or off using the external switch, the Bulb will send a basic report of its status to the nodes in association group 1. To change what kind of signal is sent to the nodes in group 1, please see the detailed description of configuration parameter 80.

When the product receives a controlling Basic Set CC/Switch Binary Set CC/Switch Multilevel Start Level Change CC, Switch Multilevel Stop Level Change CC, Switch Multilevel Set CC, Scene Activation Set CC, which if cause the productsstate to be changed, which will lead to send the Basic Set CC/Switch Binary Set CC to nodes in group 2.
This parameter is used to configure the partner ID. (0== Aeon Labs Standard Product, 1~255== others).
Aeon Labs Standard Product
Partner ID of Partner Product
This parameter is used to enable/disable Lock all configuration parameters.(0 =disable, 1 = enable)
All configuration parameters are configurable.
All configuration parameters are not configurable (Locked).
This parameter is used to reset product to default factory setting. (There are just 2 values can be used).
Reset all configuration parameters to default setting.
Reset the product to default factory setting and be excluded from the Z-wave network.

name.lang: Enable/disable the function of using external switch to turn on/off the bulb.

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable the function of using external switch to turn on/off the bulb.
Disable
Enable

name.lang: Enable/disable the function of using external switch to turn on/off the bulbs color.

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable the function of using external switch to turn on/off the bulb's color.
Disable
Enable

name.lang: Enable/Disable to send notifications to associated devices to associated devices.

description.lang: This parameter is used to Enable/Disable to send notifications to associated devices (in Group 1) when the state of bulb is changed. (0=Send nothing, 1=Send hail CC, 2=Send basic report CC).
Send BASIC Report Command
Send Nothing (Disabled)
Send HAIL Command
